properties.description: Posted by Funhouse Bearden HighWhere Gnaw and Snow went to high school.

properties.name: Country Squire Motel
properties.description: Posted by Funhouse Country Squire MotelWhere BinRBishop lost his/her virginity.

properties.name: Deane Hill Rec
properties.description: Posted by Funhouse  Deane Hill Recreational CenterWhere Gnaw\'s mom used to weigh in. Also where was held a very tragic little haunted house in the bathroom.

properties.name: Erin Presbyterian Church
properties.description: Posted by FunhouseErin Presbyterian ChurchWhere Gnaw attended montessori school and later flirted in the parking lot on the cb radio with truckdrivers.

properties.name: Midsouth
properties.description: Posted by FunhouseWhere Gnaw peed her pants after being chased by a dog.

properties.name: New bridge.
properties.description: Posted by FunhouseMorrellWhere you used to have to wait on trains.

properties.name: Premo Dope Training Ground
properties.description: Posted by Funhouse

properties.name: Rainbow Rapids
properties.description: Posted by Funhouse   Rainbow RapidsApproximate site. This is one of those jinxed properties where nothing ever really seemed to thrive. There was two-story dimly lit restaurant there for awhile which later became an underage nightclub. I think there are storage units there now.

properties.name: Royal Crown Bottling
properties.description: Posted by FunhouseRoyal Crown Bottling FacilityWhere Royal Crown soda was cranked out. Also the somewhat boring site of several class field trips.

properties.name: The Hungry Fisherman
properties.description: Posted by FunhouseHungry FishermanSite of the Hungry Fisherman, where one could feed ducks, ride paddleboats and stuff yourself silly with seafood. Became Lighthouse Recovery center later on. Not sure what\'s there now.

properties.name: Tiger
properties.description: Posted by Funhouse Tiger in a cageUnless I am totally confused on this point, I believe there was a tiger kept in a cage out in front of a pet store that Jack Hanna had something to do with. The tiger tore off the arm of a boy my age and was seen no more.

properties.name: West Town Mall
properties.description: Posted by Funhouse West Town MallRumor tells me that this was the largest mall in the southeast at the time of its inception. It\'s now probably four times the size it was. Gnaw\'s family cut christmas trees here back in the day. Also where Gnaw stole paperbacks from Gateway books. And threw Bruce Krakauer\'s down jacket in the fountain on our first middle-school date, whereupon he called his mom to take him home.

properties.name: West Town Theater
properties.description: Posted by Funhouse   West Town TheaterThe site where many blabsters first saw E.T. , Spinal Tap, and Star Wars. Also where a guy got hit by a car while picketing The Last Temptation of Christ.
